about_the_game:
This Pop Sensation Pack includes 37 idol Clothing Items, 8 idol Wigs, 16 idol Furniture Items, 1 idol Mount, and 1 idol Pet.


Calling all stans and fans! If you want to be a rising star in the world of pop, then this is the pack for you! The Pop Sensation Pack has 63 stylish outfits and luxury furniture items for you and all of your friends to dress and decorate just like the idols you always knew you were.

Pack includes:
  • Pop Sensation Furniture Set: Pop Sensation Star Chair, Pop Sensation Cast Chair, Pop Sensation Table, Pop Sensation L Couch, Pop Sensation Bed, Pop Sensation Stage Light Lamp, Pop Sensation Rug, Pop Sensation Dressing Room Table, Pop Sensation Neon Lights, Pop Sensation Microphone, Pop Sensation Keyboard, Pop Sensation Small Speaker, Pop Sensation Basic Speaker, Pop Sensation Large Speaker, Pop Sensation Costume Cart, and Pop Sensation Sound Room Acoustic Foam
  • Lead Pop Sensation Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Lead Wig, Pop Sensation Lead Sweater, and Pop Sensation Lead Skirt
  • Pop Sensation Dancer Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Dancer Wig, Pop Sensation Dancer Shirt, Pop Sensation Dancer Gloves, and Pop Sensation Dancer Pants
  • Pop Sensation Singer Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Singer Wig, Pop Sensation Singer Shirt, Pop Sensation Singer Gloves, Pop Sensation Singer Pants, and Pop Sensation Singer Glasses
  • Pop Sensation Cool Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Cool Wig, Pop Sensation Cool Jacket, Pop Sensation Cool Gloves, Pop Sensation Cool Pants, and Pop Sensation Cool Hat
  • Pop Sensation Performance Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Performance Microphone, Pop Sensation Performance Shirt, Pop Sensation Performance Gloves, and Pop Sensation Performance Pants
  • Pop Sensation Cute Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Heart Barrette, Pop Sensation Cute Microphone, Pop Sensation Cute Shirt, Pop Sensation Cute Gloves, and Pop Sensation Cute Skirt
  • Pop Sensation Serious Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Serious Wig, Pop Sensation Serious Dress, and Pop Sensation Serious Shoes
  • Pop Sensation Weeb Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Weeb Wig, Pop Sensation Weeb Headphones, Pop Sensation Weeb Shirt, Pop Sensation Weeb Gloves, and Pop Sensation Weeb Skirt
  • Pop Sensation Emo Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Emo Wig, Pop Sensation Emo Headgear, Pop Sensation Emo Jacket, Pop Sensation Emo Gloves, and Pop Sensation Emo Pants
  • Pop Sensation Heartthrob Outfit Set: Pop Sensation Heartthrob Wig, Pop Sensation Heartthrob Horns, Pop Sensation Heartthrob Shirt, Pop Sensation Heartthrob Gloves, Pop Sensation Heartthrob Tail, and Pop Sensation Heartthrob Pants
  • Pop Sensation Car Mount
  • Harmony, the Pop Sensation Dog Pet
